column2: Qurate Retail, Inc. engages in the business of video and on-line commerce industries. The company is headquartered in Englewood, Colorado and currently employs 27,226 full-time employees. Through its subsidiaries and affiliates, the Company operates in North America, Europe and Asia. The firm's principal businesses and assets include its subsidiaries QVC, Inc. (QVC), zulily, llc (zulily) and and Home Shopping Network (HSN). The firm's segments include QVC, zulily, and Corporate and other.
